StudentProfile.title: StudentProfile
StudentProfile.description: Represents the profile of a student.

id.description: Unique identifier for the StudentProfile entity.

firebaseUid.description: The Firebase UID associated with the student's authentication.

name.description: The full name of the student.

email.description: The email address of the student.

schoolId.description: Reference to School. (Relationship: School 1:N StudentProfile). Represents the school the student belongs to.

GuardianProfile.title: GuardianProfile
GuardianProfile.description: Represents the profile of a guardian.

id.description: Unique identifier for the GuardianProfile entity.

firebaseUid.description: The Firebase UID associated with the guardian's authentication.

name.description: The full name of the guardian.

email.description: The email address of the guardian.

studentRa.description: The RA of the student this guardian is responsible for.

studentId.description: The ID of the student this guardian is responsible for.

School.title: School
School.description: Represents a school entity where canteens and students belong.

id.description: Unique identifier for the School entity.

definition.description: Top-level document for a user, can contain subcollections for profiles.
Stores a student's profile data, nested under their own user ID.
Stores a guardian's profile data, nested under their own user ID.
